#summary &rightarrow; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &rightarrow;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&RightArrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2192/index.htm U+02192].
  * `&Rightarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d2/index.htm U+021D2].
  * `&rightarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2192/index.htm U+02192].
